HomePageSecondSectionPara: Our job is to take care of your business’s economy and provide the best possible financial solutions to small medium businesses. Our goal is to help businesses with a financial consultancy that will be worth more than money. We help customers in the following service areas.
homeAccountServiceParaOnSectionTwo: Our philosophy is to make it better and easy your life for entrepreneurs and self-employed people. We can help

homeSalary&HRServiceParaOnSectionTwo: Managing salaries is time consuming and costly. For smaller companies it will be difficult to hire a payroll manager who will update himself with new rules to maintain quality in payroll driving. We at Finansify offer Payroll outsourcing services to large and medium-sized companies.

homePricingSectionHeading: A Fixed price for your accounting
HomePageSectionThreePara: Our vision is to provide sustainable and innovative services to Swedish companies through quality accounting services as well as digitization and atomization of the accounting process. Our slogan is 'Quality gives security'.
HomePageSectionContactFormPara: Contact us and find more about what Finansify can offer you! example@mail.com
ContactFormCheckbox: I consent to the privacy Policy
AboutParagraph1: Finansify Sweden has been started in 2021 by Shaher Yar Ali who previously have worked with accounting and payroll industry with leading Swedish companies in Payroll and accounting. We have gathered a knowledge and competence to help the customer with better way, we are small accounting firm but having higher ambitions to grow in this field. Our customer is both from different branches and having small medium industry to work with. We have a expert to deal with financial matter of your company. If it is sound interesting, then you are welcome to contact us för declaration and bookkeeping.
AboutParagraph2: Our vision is to provide sustainable and innovative services to Swedish companies through quality accounting services as well as digitization and atomization of the accounting process. Our slogan is 'Quality gives security'.
AboutParagraph3: Our business concept is to offer services in digital accounting and business service with high quality. By working with a digital cloud-based system, we can offer our services to customers all over Sweden, regardless of geographical location.
AboutParagraph4.1: Shaher Yar Ali is a payroll specialist with extensive experience from the payroll auditing industry from both small and large companies. He has studied the payroll and accounting program at the Frans Schartaus Trade Institute. Shaher Yar has also founded Financify Sweden AB.
AboutParagraph4.2: Jamshid Rasoul is a finance and accounting consultant with experience in accounting. He has studied the Financial Accounting program in Hermods Uppsala.
CarrerPageHeading: BECOME A PART OF OUR TEAM
CarrerPageSubHeading: Our team is rapidly growing and we are currently seeking for new candidates to help contribute to our success. If you are interested in being a part of Financify Team, please complete below form and we will reach out.
AdministrationFirstSubHeadingPara: With the push of a button, you submit your material electronically and we will take care of the rest. This means that we will take care of everything related to your current accounting, supplier and customer invoices and reporting.
AdministrationSecondSubHeadingPara: With the help of Finansify and Fortnox, all your Financial Management can be managed electronically. You as our valuable customer download The Fortnox app on your mobile and send us your documents via the app.
AdministrationThirdSubHeadingPara: We offer a completely paperless Accounting and tools for digitizing all accounting documents.As a customer, you always have access to your accounts and documentation regardless of your geographic location.
AdministrationFourthSubHeadingPara: We also welcome customers who prefer to submit their documents, invoices and receipts on paper in hard copies. We request you to contact us so we can find the best solution for you and for your business.
AdministrationFifthSubHeading: Are You In The Market For a Home Business?
AdministrationFifthSubHeadingPara: We guide you through the start-up – starting a new business. We offer you a free consultation where we together go through your business idea and answer your questions you have about company formation.
AccountingFirstSubHeadingPara: We handle your vouchers, supplier invoices and customer invoices. By agreement, we together determine the level of accounting that you need and we will be responsible for.
AccountingSecondSubHeadingPara: We will file  your tax returns and employer contributions as well as keeping you updated on the date and submission times.
AccountingThirdSubHeadingPara: We can make monthly and or annual accounts, compile appendices for auditors and annual accounts
AccountingFourthSubHeadingPara: In collaboration with you, we prepare an annual report and send it to the Swedish Companies Registration Office
AccountingFifthSubHeadingPara: We can take up interim assignments for longer and shorter periods.
AccountingServicesSecondHeading: This is part of the accounting service!
AccountingServicesFirstSubHeadingPara: The day-to-day work includes handling receipts, supplier invoices, customer invoices and other documents.
AccountingServicesSecondSubHeadingPara: Ongoing tax and fee management, as well as declaration of VAT and employer declarations.
AccountingServicesThirdSubHeadingPara: Salary administration for one (1) employee per month
AccountingServicesFifthSubHeading: Annual accounts & annual report for limited companies
UmbrellaUnemployementFirstSubHeadingPara: The Umbrella employment Solutions offered to those organizations and individuals who don’t want to establish themselves in Sweden as an employer or neither wants to involve in the matter of filing tax returns and maintaining books for the operations taking place in Sweden.
UmbrellaUnemployementSecondSubHeadingPar: If you are the consultant and thinking about taking an assignment in Sweden as an Expert and will be wondering how your payroll and tax will be handled and how much you can take home, what is the best pension plan, and so on? We as Finansify Sweden are specialized to address your concerns. We are going to Process your Payroll, declare your taxes related to local tax authorities, and going to deal with other government authorities related to employment, and manage pension and other HR issues related to your assignment. Contact us and find more about what Finansify can offer you!
UmbrellaUnemployementThirdSubHeadingPara: We provide our consultant the solutions to meet local employment’s rules and regulation in connection with employment in Sweden. We take care of consultant’s employer tax filling, Salary payments, and communication to local tax authorities regarding employment.
UmbrellaUnemployementFourth01Para: We help consultants to get registered in tax office and other matters pertaining to tax office such as filling income tax returns and tax reliefs.
UmbrellaUnemployementFourth02Para: Our employees are covered by professional indemnity insurance which covers all work-related liabilities along with Operation injury insurance (TFA) and Life insurance (TGL).
Lon&HRListHeading: What we can help you with!
Lon&HRList9: Reporting to the Swedish Tax Agency and FORA reporting.
